Title: John Holm to Axel Holm 1946.7.8 Partial Letter
Description: TYPEWRITTEN COPY OF PART OF A LETTER FROM JOHN HOLM DATED JULY 8 – 1946, TO AXEL HOLM.  IT'S POSSIBLE THIS IS THE LETTER OLE MENTIONS IN HIS LETTER TO KAROLINE HOLM DATED MARCH 9 – 1947 (SUPPOSED TO BE 1948).  NO ENVELOPE.
Creator: John Holm
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
Can’t quite read the signature, looks like O Sivertsen

In the lower left corner of the paper it’s written in pencil:

$ 1.025,-

U. 38.  Kr. 5.160,05
